rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses testing procedures using neutral language.
The segment reports factual actions ('were tested').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports testing locations but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes testing ('Samples... were tested') and capability ('part of the National Animal Health Laboratory Network') without explicit reassurance.
